result.eng: Will you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ga: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.orig: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eile
result.html: An mbeidh tú fós thart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ tú fós ṫart go ceann cúpla nóiméad eileWill you still be around for another few minutes?

result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: The temperature will be around three grades Celsius.
result.ga: Beidh an teocht thart ar thrí chéim Celsius
result.orig: Beidh an teocht thart ar thrí chéim Celsius
result.html: Beidh an teocht thart ar thrí chéim CelsiusThe temperature will be around three grades Celsius.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an teoċt ṫart ar ṫrí ċéim CelsiusThe temperature will be around three grades Celsius.

result.html: Bhí mé ag amharc thartI was looking around.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag aṁarc ṫartI was looking around.

result.eng: I went around the house several times.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.orig: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uair
result.html: Chuaigh mé thart ar an teach cúpla uairI went around the house several times.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé ṫart ar an teaċ cúpla uairI went around the house several times.

result.html: Tá an cluiche thartThe game is over.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cluiċe ṫartThe game is over.

result.eng: It leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ga: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.orig: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóigh
result.html: Imeoidh sé ag a dó a chlog sa tráthnóna agus beidh sé i Nua-Eabhrac thart ar cheathrú tar éis a ceathair am Nua-Eabhrac ar ndóighIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.
result.ponchtml: Imeoiḋ sé ag a dó a ċlog sa tráṫnóna agus beiḋ sé i Nua-Eaḃrac ṫart ar ċeaṫrú tar éis a ceaṫair am Nua-Eaḃrac ar ndóiġIt leaves at two o'clock in the afternoon and it will be in New York about a quarter past four, New York time, of course.

result.html: An bhfuil Aoife thartIs Aoife around?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil Aoife ṫartIs Aoife around?

result.eng: The house is located in a small square, about two kilometres from the city centre.
result.ga: Tá an teach suite i gcearnóg bheag thart ar dhá chiliméadar ó lár na cathrach
result.orig: Tá an teach suite i gcearnóg bheag thart ar dhá chiliméadar ó lár na cathrach
result.html: Tá an teach suite i gcearnóg bheag thart ar dhá chiliméadar ó lár na cathrachThe house is located in a small square, about two kilometres from the city centre.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ suite i gcearnóg ḃeag ṫart ar ḋá ċiliméadar ó lár na caṫraċThe house is located in a small square, about two kilometres from the city centre.

result.eng: When the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.orig: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.html: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí an obráid ṫart ṫáinig an doċtúir amaċ as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.html: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.ga: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an lá
result.orig: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an lá
result.html: Chuaigh an oíche thart go dtáinig an láNight turned into day.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ an oíċe ṫart go dtáinig an láNight turned into day.

result.html: Tá sé uilig thart agatsaIt's all over for you.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé uilig ṫart agatsaIt's all over for you.

result.eng: It would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ga: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.orig: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.html: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamhIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ponchtml: Ḃeaḋ sé uilig ṫart anois agus ḃeinn as buaireaṁIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
